metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3064 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Parsing malicious or large YAML documents can consume excessive amounts of CPU or memory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3064` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-gopkg-yaml.v2-dev - 2.2.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: golang-github-coreos-discovery-etcd-io package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-yaml.v2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.2-1ubuntu0.1').
kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
webhook package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
